instruction: Can the Savitzky-Golay filter be considered a superior spectral feature processing method in the combination of LIBS and machine learning for pathogen classification, based on its signal-to-noise ratio and mean square error values?
Output: Yes, the Savitzky-Golay filter can be considered a superior spectral feature processing method in the combination of LIBS and machine learning for pathogen classification.
